Game: Hanjuku Hero- Aa, Sekaiyo Hanjukunare...! 2002-02-14T00:00:00-08:00 Hanjuku Hero: Aa, Sekaiyo Hanjukunare...! (半熟英雄 ああ、世界よ半熟なれ…!! "Let the world become soft-boiled!"?) is the second game in the series. The Egg Monsters featured in the game are parodies of Final Fantasy IV characters. The game was re-released on the WonderSwan Color in 2002. This version features a graphical overhaul and twelve new summons. 1 <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/fa2e9941-86f7-4a69-b98a-11b0dd449cd2.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/7070a452-c7b7-4095-98f2-41573e550541.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/656b5d14-3623-4955-9770-b69e67e94cdc.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/84373d12-0166-4b42-b94c-c340175078e2.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/ecd87754-bea6-44b2-acb4-6f79066012bf.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/3bf94ff6-5956-495e-a65d-636b17fe906c.png Strategy Sting Squaresoft
